description: Sugisaka is a member of the chorus club. She tries to force Nagisa to give up on establishing theatre club by threatening her, but later confronts Nagisa directly, telling Rie`s past, hoping she will not bother Rie`s dream. Youhei does not trust Sugisaka due to her usage of threat letter, and her attempt on messing up Nagisa`s shoe cabinet. In the After Story anime, Sugisaka works as a waitress in the same family restaurant as Nagisa.
name: Sugisaka
